about_the_game:
Be a cube! Alone or with your friends, play together or against each other. Chop down cube trees, mine cube resources, build a cube house.

Collect resources, craft weapons & armor, and build your base. Explore a world of cubes and uncover its mysteries. Level up your character, and customize it too! Invite your friends to play with you if you have some! Show them that hat that you're really proud of. Destroy your friend's house, and blame someone else!

Cube RPG throws you and your friends into a fun and action packed experience in a world where everything is a cube. Do you have what it takes to save the Cube Kingdom?

Features:
  • Multiplayer: Cube Versus Cube or Cube CO-OP
  • Crafting
  • Building
  • (SPOILER HIDDEN)
  • 6-Sided fun!

    [̲̅:)]
